short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change bookmark bar content to the selected bookmark folder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To make bookmark bar more useful you can change the content of bookmark bar by using choosing your bookmark folder.

!!! WARNING !!!
BY USING THIS EXTENSION ALL YOUR CURRENT BOOKMARKS IN YOU BOOKMARK-BAR WILL BE DELETED. MAKE SURE TO COPY THEM TO A FOLDER BEFORE YOU USE BOOKAROO.


-Enjoy
